overview:
Avi Goldberg has been with GreatPoint Ventures since inception and is currently the chief operating officer at GreatPoint Energy. Prior to joining GPV, he was the chief operating officer and co-founder of Coatue Corporation responsible for managing all legal, financial and operational planning functions for the company.

From 1998 through 2001, Avi served as Director of Worldwide Sales and Network Optimization at Cignal Global Communications where he managed sales and cost containment for Cignal’s core business units, generating $50 million a year in revenue. Prior to that, he led the planning, development, and management of several Non-Profit and Federal Grants at Holt, Wexler and Farnum in Connecticut. Avi received a BA in Political Science and Strategic Intelligence, magnacum laude from Boston University.
